title: Port Rapier narrowphase filters (ActiveCollisionTypes + collision_groups)
description:
Implement the same filtering rules as Rapier when building contact/intersection pairs:
- Same-parent exclusion
- ActiveCollisionTypes filtering (skip if neither collider allows the body-type pair)
- InteractionGroups collision_groups filtering
Add MoonBit tests ported from Rapier behavior.
